QuestData.Title: Freeing Our Brothers
QuestData.Description: You may be an outsider, but you and I have a common enemy in the hozen.$B$BMany members of my tribe are trapped in cages nearby. I have also seen your... Alliance... soldiers as well.$B$BI cannot leave without freeing my brethren, just as you cannot leave yours.$B$BThe Slingtail hold the keys to those cages. Find the keys and free our friends.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 6 Jinyu Prisoners or Alliance Prisoners.
QuestData.RewardText: You have freed my brothers? Good.$B$BWe are in your debt.
